channel.title: Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace
channel.description:
I don't get it, I can log on the server, but I still get this error.
Matthew: character file not found. Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\stackable.dat (The system cannot find the pa th specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at Item.(Item.java:346) at client.addItem(client.java:4907) at client.initialize(client.java:9010) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:329) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while loading notedata! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\notes.dat (The system cannot find the path s pecified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at Item.(Item.java:374) at client.addItem(client.java:4907) at client.initialize(client.java:9010) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:329) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while loading twohanded! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\twohanded.dat (The system cannot find the pa th specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at Item.(Item.java:391) at client.addItem(client.java:4907) at client.initialize(client.java:9010) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:329) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while loading tradeable! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\tradeable.dat (The system cannot find the pa th specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at Item.(Item.java:409) at client.addItem(client.java:4907) at client.initialize(client.java:9010) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:329) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while loading sellable! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\sellable.dat (The system cannot find the pat h specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at Item.(Item.java:427) at client.addItem(client.java:4907) at client.initialize(client.java:9010) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:329) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Help me as soon as possible, please! I really need help.

item.title: Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

It is "programming", not "coding", and it is unwise to be impolite to the people who would help you.

No one helped me, and I’m not being impolite.

I knew enough about fileops when I started working with programming languages to solve an issue so simple as a file or directory not existing.

And your point?

On a more serious note: Close this thread, people are just posting without even helping. And I got my problem fixed.

Read full topic
item.source: Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace

item.title: Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

[quote=“Macoronizer, post:3, topic:292875”]Instead of fucking saying “Are you serious”, you should explain it to me.

I’m new to coding, and I’m 100% when you first started coding, you didn’t know how to fix it as well.

So if you don’t want to fucking explain on how to fix it, then don’t fucking post saying “are you serious? it can’t find the file in the path specified”.[/quote]

It is “programming”, not “coding”, and it is unwise to be impolite to the people who would help you.

I'm new to coding, and I'm 100% when you first started coding, you didn't know how to fix it as well.

I knew enough about fileops when I started working with programming languages to solve an issue so simple as a file or directory not existing.

Read full topic
item.source: Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace

item.title: Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

It works now.

And you think I care? Saying “fucking” three times. I didn’t tried to act cool. So I don’t know what you’re talking about. And it’s not like if you never said it.

And if you would of read I said: “If you can’t explain on how to fix it, then don’t post”. Did you explain? No.

Read full topic
item.source: Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace

item.title: Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Macoronizer, post:3, topic:292875”]Instead of fucking saying “Are you serious”, you should explain it to me.

I’m new to coding, and I’m 100% when you first started coding, you didn’t know how to fix it as well.

So if you don’t want to fucking explain on how to fix it, then don’t fucking post saying “are you serious? it can’t find the file in the path specified”.[/quote]This isn’t a coding problem, this is a basic computer problem; basic English problem, really.

And by the way, saying “fucking” three times doesn’t make you sound cool or any more serious. It blatantly displays your low 9-year-old level of maturity, and also makes you look like a complete idiot.

Read full topic
